      • updatePanel

        public void updatePanel​(java.lang.String pName,
                        int pPoints,
                        java.lang.String pImagePath,
                        java.lang.String pInterests,
                        java.lang.String pFears,
                        boolean pBeingOfLight)
        Updates the encyclopedia information that is displayed for each magical creature.
        post: The information in the panel is updated for the current magical creature.
        Parameters:
        pName - Name of the creature. pName != null && pName != "".
        pPoints - Points the player obtains when finding a creature. pPoints > 0.
        pImagePath - Image path of the creature. pCreatureImagePath != null && pCreatureImagePath != "".
        pInterests - Interests of the creature. pInterests != null && pInterests != "".
        pFears - Fears of the creature. pFears != null && pFears != "".
        pBeingOfLight - True if the creature is a being of light, false if contrary.
